kashmiraye gatum: indiyawata erehiwa ekata eka karana bawa pakisthanaya pawasayi – aththa withthi kashmiraye gatum: indiyawata erehiwa ekata eka karana bawa pakisthanaya pawasayi kashmiraye gatum indiya palitha kashmirayedi indiya aarakshaka ansha wetha ella wu maragena marena praharayen anathuruwa indiyawa pakisthanayata erehiwa hamudamaya kriyamargayak ganne nam siya rata da ee ha samana prathicharayak dakwanu athi bawa pakisthanaye agamathi imran khan pawasayi.
